thread.title: Justin Bieber highlights from the NHL Celebrity Shootout
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber highlights from the NHL Celebrity Shootout

author: Daniel Goffenberg
title: Justin Bieber highlights from the NHL Celebrity Shootout
text:
Presented by: Justin Bieber highlights from the NHL Celebrity Shootout 
Check out the player intros for the NHL Celebrity Shootout, including superstars like Tim Robbins and David Boreanaz. Daniel Goffenberg @interndaniel January 28, 2017, 8:00 PM 
Pop star Justin Bieber made quite an impression at the 2017 NHL All-Star Celebrity Shootout. 
The Stratford, Ont., native was all over the ice; completing successful zone entries, drawing penalties, and (eventually) chipping in offensively. 
His first penalty shot attempt was denied by former NHL goaltender Jamie Storr. 
He got another chance later in the scrimmage, after getting tripped by Ray Bourque, and crunched by Chris Pronger. AP snapped an amazing photo of Chris Pronger squashing Justin Bieber into the boards: pic.twitter.com/hhykeHh5Oh 
â€” Charlie Roumeliotis (@CRoumeliotis) January 28, 2017 
Bieber's second penalty shot came with some added flair as he tried to mimic Pavel Bure before again getting shut down by Storr's glove. . @justinbieber hasn't scored One Time on a penalty shot. #NHLAllStar
